about.title: About Arkan Secondary School
about.subtitle: A distinguished lycÃ©e qualifiant in Tiznit committed to academic excellence and community engagement.

overview.description1: Arkan Secondary School (Ø§ÙØ«Ø§ÙÙÙØ© Ø§ÙØªØ£ÙÙÙÙØ© Ø£Ø±ÙØ§Ù) is an upper-secondary lycÃ©e qualifiant located in the city of Tiznit in the Souss-Massa region of Morocco. Established in the 2014s, our school has quickly earned a distinguished place among the province's secondary schools in terms of academic results and educational influence.
overview.description2: Our school offers the standard Moroccan educational pathway with classes for the common core (Ø¬Ø°ÙØ¹ ÙØ´ØªØ±ÙØ©), Premier BaccalaurÃ©at (1Ã¨re bac), and Terminal BaccalaurÃ©at (2Ã¨me bac). We are committed to academic excellence, cultural engagement, and community development.

establishment.title: 2014s: Establishment
establishment.description: Arkan Secondary School was established in the 2014s as a new lycÃ©e qualifiant in the city of Tiznit, with a mission to provide quality upper-secondary education to the local community.

cultural.title: 2015: Cultural Development
cultural.description: The school organized its "Artistic-Educational Evening" under the motto "Success for All", featuring recitations, Amazigh (Ahwash) dances, songs, and plays in both Amazigh and French.

excellence.title: 2017: Recognition of Excellence
excellence.description: Arkan Secondary School hosted a "Celebration of Excellence" ceremony to honor top-achieving students from all academic levels, and earned distinction among the province's secondary schools for academic results.

environmental.title: 2023: Environmental Engagement
environmental.description: Students participated in the Mohammed VI Foundation's "Young Journalists for the Environment" competition, submitting a video report about plastic waste in Tiznit and winning a prize for an environmental photograph.

programs.title: Educational Programs
programs.description: Following the standard Moroccan educational system, our lycÃ©e offers a three-year upper secondary program:

commonCore.title: Tronc Commun (Common Core)
commonCore.description: The first year provides a common curriculum for all students. At the end of this year, students take standardized regional exams and are then tracked into specific streams based on their choices and results.

firstBac.title: First Baccalaureate Year (1Ã¨re Bac)
firstBac.description: In this second year, students begin specializing in their chosen streams, which may include:

secondBac.title: Second Baccalaureate Year (2Ã¨me Bac)
secondBac.description: The final year continues students' specialization in their chosen streams. All students take the national BaccalaurÃ©at exam at the end of this year, which is required for university admission.

academic.title: Academic Excellence
academic.description: As reported in 2017, our lycÃ©e has quickly "earned a distinguished place among the province's secondary schools in terms of academic results and educational influence."

cultural.title: Cultural Events
cultural.description: Our school regularly hosts cultural and educational events that showcase student talents and recognize achievements:

evening.title: Artistic-Educational Evening (2015):
evening.description: Featured recitations, Amazigh dances, songs, and theatrical performances

excellence.title: Celebration of Excellence (2017):
excellence.description: Recognized top students and included a moral theater performance about exam ethics

unesco.title: UNESCO's World Argane Tree Day:
unesco.description: Organized a cultural week with exhibitions, mural painting, and scientific talks

environmental.title: Environmental Engagement
environmental.description: Our students actively participate in environmental awareness and conservation efforts:

projects.video: Video report on plastic waste in Tiznit submitted to the Mohammed VI Foundation's "Young Journalists for the Environment" competition (2023)
projects.photo: Award-winning environmental photograph titled "Where to? Who Stops the Sprawl?" highlighting pollution threatening local date-palm groves (2023)

community.title: Community Support
community.description: Our school benefits from strong community and parent involvement:

initiatives.notebooks: In the 2016/2017 school year, parents through the parent-teacher association donated 1,000 large notebooks to distribute to all Arkan students
initiatives.media: This initiative was covered by local media as an example of community mobilization for quality education

facilities.title: Facilities
facilities.description: While detailed information on Arkan's facilities is not extensively documented, our school is equipped with essential educational spaces to support student learning and activities:

auditorium.title: Auditorium/School Hall
auditorium.description: Our school has a dedicated space (ÙØ§Ø¹Ø© Ø£Ù ÙØ¶Ø§Ø¡ Ø§ÙÙØ¤Ø³Ø³Ø©) for hosting cultural events, ceremonies, and student performances.

classrooms.title: Classrooms
classrooms.description: Modern classrooms equipped for the different educational levels and streams: common core, first baccalaureate, and second baccalaureate.

campus.title: Campus Grounds
campus.description: Outdoor areas that accommodate exhibitions, cultural activities, and student gatherings.

resources.title: Educational Resources
resources.description: Learning materials and resources to support the national curriculum across all streams and specializations.

cta.title: Join Our Academic Community
cta.description: Arkan Secondary School offers a supportive environment where students can excel academically and develop personally through diverse educational and cultural experiences.
